channel.title: Can't make new shops. Help
channel.description: Hi (317, Project Corrupted) Can't make shops error's *At me they free also has decided to try (522 NPCID) in autospawn.cfg:spawn = 522 3234 3218 0 0 0 0 0 1 new shop store in shop.cfg:shop = 19 trade_new_shop 1 1 317 5 in client.java:} else if (NPCID == 522) { // new shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 19; why errors? errors: at java.langNumerFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:2098) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:549 at server.main(server.java:111)

item.title: Can't make new shops. Help
item.dc:creator: @artyr artyr
item.description:
@artyr wrote:

Hi (317, Project Corrupted)
Can’t make shops error’s
*At me they free also has decided to try (522 NPCID)
in autospawn.cfg:spawn = 522 3234 3218 0 0 0 0 0 1 new shop store
in shop.cfg:shop = 19 trade_new_shop 1 1 317 5
in client.java:} else if (NPCID == 522) {
// new shop
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 19;
why errors? errors:
at java.langNumerFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:2098)
at NPCHandler.(NPCHandler.java:549
at server.main(server.java:111)

Read full topic
